title: Three high level players discuss who will win Worlds in 2015, guess who.

embed.description: Very few are born with the power to see into the future. The rest of us are forced to recklessly and repeatedly make outrageously specific predictions until one of them comes true and we can claim to be wizards. Well, bookmark this page, friends, because this is where we become wizards!

body:
So, Phreak, Jatt and Xpecial sat down to speculate on the contested picks of 2015 Worlds.

Notice how all three players pick different champions for each position, none of them agreeing with each other in the slightest bit. Wait, hang on, that doesn't seems to be the case for the jungle...

http://imgur.com/gLeR2aF

Yup, the only thing they can agree on is that {{champion:64}} is going to dominate world championships again this year.

http://images.sodahead.com/polls/001140709/surprise1256905092_xlarge.gif
